name: Media Naranja: My second half
description:
Deep down in the fallen kingdom of Under the Bed, lies a secret and savage civilization of those who were dragged there by The Beast. Countles socks had lost their pairs in this chaotic realm. Legends says, however, that lost socks can return from below the bed. As The God started casting away those socks without pair to the realm of The Garbage, our hero will venture itself to Under the Bed to rescue its pair and be safe from The Garbage doom.

Do not take this game too seriously! We are just friends who met in the 2021 Global Game Jam and made this game in a weekend. Is simple, and thats it. If you liked it, great! If you don't, then fix it, and let us know about what you did. Here the repo: https://github.com/Demian159/GGJ-Buscando-Mi-Media-Naranja. The code is a mess and it is half in spanish, but you can handle it!

Credits: 

German Dartsch - Programmer
Adrián Salatino - Programmer
Rodrigo Villegas - Music/SFX
Denise Bustos - 2d Artist
Eric Williams - Game/Level Designer
Pablo Becerra - 2d Artist
Gabriela Crespin  - 2d Artist
Ricardo Pino - UI/U

We don't plan on expanding this game, but if you want to, you can do it, and maybe we will upload your contribution!

Greets!

Media Naranja's Crew
